title: React Interview Preparation
description: Prepare for React interviews with concepts, questions, and real-world thinking

intro.title: Interview Mindset
intro.story: Interviews are not exams. They test how you think, not how much you memorize.
intro.preview: Concepts, questions, and how to answer confidently.

section1.content:

- Controlled vs Uncontrolled components
- Keys and reconciliation

section2.title: Hooks Interview Questions
section2.content:
- Why hooks were introduced
- useState vs useReducer
- useEffect lifecycle behavior
- useMemo vs useCallback
- Custom hooks

quiz1.title: Interview Question
quiz1.question: Why should we not mutate state directly?

section3.title: Performance Questions
section3.content:
- How to reduce re-renders
- React.memo usage
- Lazy loading
- Code splitting

quiz2.title: Explain This
quiz2.question: What problem does this solve?
quiz2.answer: Prevents unnecessary re-renders when props do not change

section4.title: State Management Questions
section4.content:
- When to use Context
- Redux vs Zustand
- Local vs Global state decisions

task.title: Explain Like a Child
task.sampleAnswer: State is like a box where a component keeps its changing values.

final.title: You Are Interview Ready
